| rev1 = Allmusic rev1Score = [ link] noprose = yes
}} 'Play' is the title of the fourth studio album by American country music
singer David Ball. It was released in 1999 on Warner Bros. Records. The album
produced the singles "Watching My Baby Not Come Back" (which Ball co-wrote with
then-newcomer Brad Paisley) and "I Want To with You", which respectively reached
#47 and #67 on the [[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]] country charts.

The track "What Do You Say to That" was also recorded by George Strait on his
1999 album [[Always Never the Same (George Strait album)|Always Never the
Same]], from which it was released as a single. McBride & the Ride later
recorded "Hasta Luego, My Love" under the title "Hasta Luego" on their 2002
album [[Amarillo Sky (album)|Amarillo Sky]].
